# Install Python

## Install `uv`

You don't actually even need to install Python anymore, because `uv` takes care of Python installation automatically. Follow instructions at <https://docs.astral.sh/uv/> to install `uv`.

### MacOS/Linux/WSL

``` bash
curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh
```

## Windows

``` powershell
powershell -ExecutionPolicy ByPass -c "irm https://astral.sh/uv/install.ps1 | iex"
```
